Author: dostoyefski
Text: I always lay awake at night reliving embarrassing/awkward memories, it’s the worst!  If he didn’t say anything and just put the book away then he probably understood that it’s a private issue. I’m sure he didn’t judge you for it, sooooo many people suffer from various mental health issues  If I noticed that book on someone’s shelf I’d think “good for them trying to get better” :-)
